author: Kyle Wiggers
title: OpenAI debuts new text-to-video generator, Sora
description: OpenAI today announced Sora, a new generative AI model that can create videos from text prompts.

author: Reuters Staff
title: Global markets react to latest economic data
description: Investors are closely watching inflation figures and central bank announcements this week.

author: Jake Michaels
title: Lakers secure narrow victory in overtime thriller
description: A last-second shot from downtown sealed the deal in a nail-biting finish against the Celtics.

author: Zack Sharf
title: 'Dune: Part Two' early reviews praise epic scale and stunning visuals
description: Critics are hailing the sci-fi sequel as a cinematic masterpiece ahead of its March release.
